script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_measures (measureid, measurename, aliasname, type, expression, description) SELECT nextval('amp_measures_seq'), 'Unexpenditured Balance', 'Unexpenditured Balance', 'A', 'unexpendituredBalance', 'Total Actual Disbursement - Total Actual Expenditures' FROM dual LEFT JOIN amp_measures ON amp_measures.measurename = 'Unexpenditured Balance' WHERE amp_measures.measurename IS NULL;
